{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DSL-2640B |revision=T1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/24/2009 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=KA2SL2640BT1 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6333;BCM6333KFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=25X32VSIG |fla1_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L128168A-7T |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |jtag= |serial=yes,, |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4312;BCM4312KFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=ADSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301KSG; ,,;1; |flags=ADSL2+, boot log |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:24:01,14:D6:4D |oui_eth=00:24:01,14:D6:4D }} {{TagLine|Wireless ADSL Modem Router}} [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2640b On the '''OpenWrt Wiki'''] *[[D-Link DSL-2640B rev T1]] device uses... :CPU - [[Broadcom]] BCM6333KFBG (ADSL2+ SoC) :WLAN - [[Broadcom]] BCM4312KFBG (802.11bg) :Switch - [[Broadcom]] BCM5325EKQMG :ADSL LD - [[Broadcom]] BCM6301KSG *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=33146 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :SoC identifies as a [[Broadcom]] BCM6338 via /proc/cpuinfo, 239.20 BogoMIPS, :BCM6338A2 Ethernet Network Device, CPU revision is: 00029010 (same as [[Sagemcom F@st 1704 (Windstream)|this device]]) :96333W prom init may indicate the device is using BCM6333 :[[Broadcom]] BCM4312, 802.11bg Wi-Fi, SDIO :14:D6:4D OUI *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=24487 Another post on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] (CFE log, archived below) :''zhadoom'' indicates the device uses [[Broadcom]] BCM6333 :00:24:01 OUI ==Boot log==
